In South Dakota, the most hotly contested race this election year doesn't involve candidates.

Supreme Court's Roe vs. Wade decision.

My name is Kelly and I'm a volunteer with the Campaign for Healthy Families, which is the group working to overturn the abortion ban because we feel it is too restrictive for our state and it makes no exceptions for victims of rape or incest of if a woman's health is endangered.
